EmailTemplate.name: 201804_Americas_Nurture_TFE731_Certified Engine Exchanges_JRD.201804_Americas_Nu
EmailTemplate.subject: Major TFE731 Engine Maintenance Inspection Got You Down?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Valued Customer,
Is your aircraft ready for a major engine maintenance inspection? You have options when it comes to keeping your aircraft flying.
With Honeywell’s TFE731 certified engine exchange program, you can exchange your run-of-the-mill engine for one of our certified, pre-owned TFE731 engines. Plus, you’ll receive a trade-in credit and free shipping for your old engine!
Don’t let your aircraft sit any longer. You don’t need to setup an account, and exchanging your TFE731 engine is easier than ever before.
Browse our certified, pre-owned inventory and choose the engine that’s right for you today.
VIEW ENGINE LISTINGS <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/services-and-support/godirect-services/certified-engine-exchanges]]>
